      :value: True

      :value: True

      :value: True

      :value: True

      :value: True



   .. py:attribute:: supports_slicing_ordering_in_compound
      :value: True

      :value: False



   .. py:attribute:: supports_update_conflicts
      :value: True



   .. py:attribute:: create_test_procedure_without_params_sql
      :value: Multiline-String

      .. raw:: html

         <details><summary>Show Value</summary>

      .. code-block:: python

         """
                 CREATE PROCEDURE test_procedure ()
                 BEGIN
                     DECLARE V_I INTEGER;
                     SET V_I = 1;
                 END;
             """

      .. raw:: html

         </details>




   .. py:attribute:: create_test_procedure_with_int_param_sql
      :value: Multiline-String

      .. raw:: html

         <details><summary>Show Value</summary>

      .. code-block:: python

         """
                 CREATE PROCEDURE test_procedure (P_I INTEGER)
                 BEGIN
                     DECLARE V_I INTEGER;
                     SET V_I = P_I;
                 END;
             """

      .. raw:: html

         </details>




   .. py:attribute:: create_test_table_with_composite_primary_key
      :value: Multiline-String

      .. raw:: html

         <details><summary>Show Value</summary>

      .. code-block:: python

         """
                 CREATE TABLE test_table_composite_pk (
                     column_1 INTEGER NOT NULL,
                     column_2 INTEGER NOT NULL,
                     PRIMARY KEY(column_1, column_2)
                 )
             """

      .. raw:: html

         </details>

      :value: False

      :value: True

   .. py:method:: django_test_skips()


   .. py:method:: allows_auto_pk_0()

      Autoincrement primary key can be set to 0 if it doesn't generate new
      autoincrement values.
